Professional Development

Brilliant Career in Beauty & Fashion!

Build a brilliant career in beauty & fashion by joining SS Group! Bring your dreams to life as part of a team that creates Indonesia’s top beauty, fashion, and self-care products while growing in a supportive, innovative, and creative environment. Your journey starts here!

Hiring Process at SS Group

Join SS Group and embark on a journey where your talents meet endless possibilities, fostering personal and professional growth every step of the way.

1. Submit

Apply for the position by submitting your resume and completing.

2. Screening

Evaluate qualifications, assess skills, and determine suitability for the role.

3. Technical Test

Assess skills, evaluate fit, and analyze potential for success in role.

4. Interview HR

Evaluate potential and suitability through discussion with the HR team.

5. Interview User

Meet the team, assess qualifications, and evaluate fit.

6. Offering

Receive the job offer, finalize details, and confirm your acceptance.
